description: XGBoost binary classifier (3000 trees) trained on master phishing URL dataset. Identifies phishing attempts based on 16 URL lexical, structural, and semantic features.
notes: All features must be provided in the exact order specified in feature_names
Feature extraction must match the Colab training notebook (train.ipynb)
Model performs inference entirely client-side with no external dependencies
Entropy calculation must iterate over 256 possible byte values to match Python implementation
Threshold of 0.50 achieves ~89% accuracy with balanced precision/recall
